name: Hyper speed [Vectrex]
description:
Are you rad enough pilot to fly Lockheed SR-71 Blackbird and reach three times the speed of sound!

Hyper Speed is a brand new exciting cartridge for your Vectrex Home Arcade System.
You control a fast plane and your goal is to score high by flying through gates.

The game was created for Global Game Jam 2021.
